name: Aito Deliverance
description:
Deliver packages in a dystopian future.

You awake from the RedWood Body Safe™ Recovery Couch - you keep your history to yourself.
But as you are forced to ply the dark nights, delivering packages for Big Wood, bits of you and your circumstances float up.
Can you delay your inevitable tendencies? Maybe even avoid them?

Key Stats
  • 5 Endings! (4 "bad", 1 "good")
  • One secrrret Ending! 
  • Two "romances"!
Controls
  • Mouse Left Click
  • Mouse Drag
  • Hover texts galore - look for the [Interactable] marker!
  • Escape key / Right Click to go out of modes
Hints 
  • [Interactible] == you can click it and stuff happens! (usually)
  • The objectives may be simple, but there are bit of story to be found all over the place
  • Deliver to the Door & 📷 it
  • Blip them 📦es for🌿
Known issues
  • Boxes may escape the world, they're jumpy
  • Any screen ratio that is not 16:9 is going to be uggly
  • Didn't have time for the bottom artworks :slight_frown: - just look at the top one, ok?
